title: Chad
description: ~ ~ ~ ~ Chad ~ ~ ~ ~ I’m a jerk, an asshole. I live my life, free and wild. I love my brothers, they have my back. MC is everything. They’re my family. I don’t need an old lady. I’m more a hookup type of man. Until the one hookup stays on my mind. I don’t know her name. I don’t know where she lives. My soul cries for her. I need to forget her. I’m no good for her. She’s a good girl. I’m a bastard. Then she walks into Hades Asylum She blows my mind.  ~ ~ ~ ~ Sabrina ~ ~ ~ ~ I went to the Hades Asylum. My friend begged me to go. I didn’t think it was a good idea. I mean, outlaw bikers? Really? I went. Not really what I thought. I met my dream man. I hooked up. Something I never do. It was a perfect weekend. He was a little drunk. He didn’t use protection. I don’t know if he remembers me. I need to talk to him. I need to tell him.  (HEA . . . Dark Alphas MC Romance, standalone, no cliff hangers)
author: P.T. Macias
